thread.title: Pakistani crushed to death in Sharjah wall collapse
thread.title_full: Pakistani crushed to death in Sharjah wall collapse

title: Pakistani crushed to death in Sharjah wall collapse
text: | Last updated on February 7, 2017 at 06.38 pm Share Vote The body has been moved to the forensic laboratory and an investigation is ongoing. A 19-year-old Pakistani died on Monday noon after a wall fell on him while he was working in Sharjah's Al Khan area. The body of the deceased was transferred to the forensic laboratory of Sharjah Police.Dedicated units of the criminal, ambulance and rescue departments rushed to the scene as soon as they received information of the incident, and found the body of the young man on the ground, where he had died after a fall fell on him. The officials placed the body in the ambulance and examined the site of the incident.The Sharjah prosecutor ordered the body to the forensic laboratory in Sharjah, while forensic experts and municipality officials moved a team of criminal investigators to inspect the place to see the cause of the incident and factors that led to his death. Amira Agarib
